abstract: The appeal will test the courts’ power to overturn the financial regulations that stemmed from the banking overhaul after the financial crisis.
snippet: The appeal will test the courts’ power to overturn the financial regulations that stemmed from the banking overhaul after the financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: A fierce legal battle that pits financial firms against the retailing industry took a new turn on Wednesday when the Federal Reserve said it would appeal a recent decision involving debit card transaction fees.

headline.main: Fed Appeals Rejection of Rule on Debit Card Fees
headline.print_headline: Fed Appeals Rejection of Rule on Debit Card Fees

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
